title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       To learn more about what is happening at Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts, please review current News Releases and news archives. Stay Connected Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts provides several ways to stay connected to what is happening in the park. In addition to the website, we maintain Twitter and Facebook pages. Facebook Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts has an official government Facebook page at https://www.facebook.com/wolftrapnps. Twitter Follow @Wolf_Trap_NPS on Twitter and receive tweets from us to your desktop, smart phone or other hand-held device. We often tweet about events in the park and history related to our mission. Contact Us For more information, contact Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts at (703) 255-1800 or e-mail.
